section.title: Cache
section.screen:
<?php
require_once('Cache.php');

$cache = new Cache('file', array('cache_dir' => '/tmp/cache/') ); 

$id = $cache->generateID('test');

if ($data = $cache->get($id)) { 
    print "Cache hit. Data: $data";

} else { 
    $data = 'Hello world!!!'; 
    $cache->save($id, $data); 
    print 'Cache miss.'; 
}
